website_summaries.verdict: The Cloud X from On Running managed to get high marks from consumers. Many users commended the shoe’s construction and the effectiveness of its features. It received very little criticism, but the consumers believe there is still room for improvement for the Cloud X. Overall, as a lot of people considered the Cloud X to be versatile and supportive, it is safe to say that it was a winning shoe.
pros: Many runners considered the Cloud X to be the best shoe yet from On, because of its outstanding performance and the on-foot experience it brought
The midsole has been incredibly light yet responsive, according to a user
The shoe was extremely comfortable even from the first use, a wearer commented
One athlete remarked that the shoe provided relief for their bunions
The Cloud X allowed complete freedom of movement, no matter the activity, an impressed user said
There was exceptional lateral support from the midsole, wrote a reviewer
A buyer praised the superb cushioning that was present during high-intensity interval training (HIIT)
The open toe box allowed the foot to spread naturally during medium-paced runs, a runner observed
The foot lockdown supplied by the midfoot area was effective in preventing slippage, as stated by a wearer
cons: The outsole was quite challenging to clean, according to a user
Some runners felt that the sole unit was far too firm to be used as a daily runner
A couple of reviewers thought the laces were too long

customer_reviews.title: Great for reducing the impact
customer_reviews.text: Have been running in these for a couple of months now. I'd had a few issues with my knee previously and not being the most slimmest of runners wanted a shoe that reduced the impact on my knees. This pair certainly ticked the box. They are super comfy and wide in the toe box so no blisters. They also feel very light and are well ventilated so none of that hot feet feeling whilst running! When I first tried them on I wasn't sure about the laces but they are actually really secure. Am now an On Cloud convert and will be looking to purchase another pair in different colour 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Emma^G

customer_reviews.title: Mizumo Good-By!! Hello Cloudflow!!
customer_reviews.text: Mizumo lovers, we who have been betrayed with the WR 19 & 20, time has come to say good buy to Mizumo. The Cloudflow is amazing! The plateform is firm and responsive. Not sluggish or cottony as the WR 19 and 20. The footing on paths and fields is very secure and adapts very well to the bumps and wholes. I run with them on wet surface and mud and are astonishly gripping very well. The blocks of the plateform play a very important role to stabilise the footsteps. No vibrations either. Definitely a replacement to Mizumo for those who like firm and responsive shoes.
customer_reviews.author: didier c.

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are the Cloudflows insanely good-looking, but they are super comfortable too! The ride is very smooth and although they don't look particularly cushioned, the cloud pods certainly do their job well. Only slight niggle is they come up quite long - I'm usually a UK 11 and bought a UK 10.5 (as I read about their length on other reviews), yet they're still pretty long. Will be running a Marathon in these in a couple of weeks and if I had the choice I wouldn't choose any other shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cloud flow women's trainers
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely trainer. I think they are best suited to shorter distances personally, probably 10k. Initially I felt that a couple of toes were rubbing on each foot but I think that may have been due to landing more forefoot in this shoe to what I'm used to and since having adapted I no longer have issues. Flexible, comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Miss tippytoes

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality wafer thin insoles causing blisters
customer_reviews.text: First run tonight and I have a load of little blisters on the front pads of my feet, I knew it was going to be an issue after the first 500 metres. I’m pretty sure it’s down to the wafer thin front parts of the insoles as the blisters match where the ventilation holes in the insoles are. Should have stuck with brooks glycerin, lesson learned. Glycerin 18 it is.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Discovered this make several years ago and haven’t looked back - no hip or knee problems since wearing them - I run anywhere from 5 - 70km a week and they work - so light and effective. Then I use them for walking when I need a new running pair.
customer_reviews.author: nadine

customer_reviews.title: great customer service and love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: While the Amazon site originally didn't do a great job of keeping me updated on package track and trace. When I finally got to the company itself, they were super at getting me straightened out with the correct order and track and trace information that showed me exactly where everything was in transit. They wen above and beyond with followup texts to make sure I got my product as expected. The shoes are fabulous and exactly what I expected. How comfortable! It really is like walking on clouds...
customer_reviews.author: kevin neave

customer_reviews.title: Sections of sole collapse
customer_reviews.text: This is/was a terrible shoe. I have not had a lot of miles clocked in it and after a closer inspection have found that several of the pockets of foam have collapsed on the forefoot..binning them now. Do not buy these. Also they do not feel very comfortably..clever advertising campaign but absolutely awful shoe if you are going to do anything quicker than 9 mins/mile in them..
customer_reviews.author: Darren Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer - excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous light trainer that fits securely but not restrictive with breathable material. The supplier is also spot on with their customer service, would highly recommend the supplier and trainer. Will definitely buy from these guys again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit, light weight shoe - I use with Superfeet Black insoles { in all my shoes - Carbon ,Green and Black - depending on volume } A firm and responsive ride: bought on the strength of other reviews: Will use a lot more when the weather improves .The over all fit, for me, is similar to Salamon trail shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Paul Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: They get 1 star. I have had these since April and the sole is falling off them. On does not offer warranty on their trainers brought on Amazon. I am now stuck with trainers that are broken
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a couple of runs in these shoes. They are comfortable and light and they protect my knees, which normally suffer if I run on hard surfaces. Very pleased with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: SidneyGee

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful of the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Still not sure after several runs if I like these running shoes. After several runs I have binned these running shoes. They gave me no foot support and very little cushioning. I started to develop shin splints. Something I have not had in the last forty years of running. They were recommended in an article on running in the Times newspaper. Worst pair I have ever bought. Have gone back to Hoka One One and wished I had never left them.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Sygmuta

customer_reviews.title: If only these wear a wide fit, I would be on cloud 9.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely quality, great cushioned feel from radical sole design but way too narrow for my broad feet. They look a bit too dressy rather than stripped for speed. Shame, they really do have that running on cloud feel. I would give them 5 stars if they had a wider fit, unfortunately I cannot wear them.
customer_reviews.author: BloodMeridien

customer_reviews.title: Amazing confort and fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes , amazing support and excellent food sizing . Truly like walking on clouds and it means morning but sunshine all around!
customer_reviews.author: MR E ANDREASSEN

customer_reviews.title: I really like them! Although ordered online they fitted almost perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like them! Although ordered online they fitted almost perfectly well. And it's really a special feeling to walk with them. What I don't like: you collect quite some grabbles as you walk typical walking paths...
customer_reviews.author: Guitarwheeper

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw in the sole
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but I will not buy this brand/ model again as the wide deep channels on the sole are a perfect fit for stones, pieces of wood etc. Very annoying to hear a constant click, click, click where a stone has lodged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this a handful of times compared to the one my sister bought from a shop. The back of the shoes was torn on the 5th ware, now the tear just gone bigger. So disappointed , paid a top £ for it.
customer_reviews.author: shahid

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves them to run in.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. They are so comfy and light to run in. He couldn't recommend them enough. Worth paying the extra!
customer_reviews.author: Miss J

customer_reviews.title: Great fitness shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fitness shoes, I have two pairs now (first were chewed by my Cockapoo, good job I love him!!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable! I don't usually spend that much on running footwear. I am a seasoned runner, but the extra money is worth it. I like the colour, the style and the fit. Very light on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: til

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent footwear. This is my second pair.... Lovely fit and so light. Excellent co tCt and communication with seller too.
customer_reviews.author: derek brown

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light. Only 4 stars as I think they are overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but pay attention to delivery of the right size!
customer_reviews.text: I asked for a 10 and received a 10 1/2 cant be bothered to return
customer_reviews.author: j3p

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best I have ever owned. Will never get any other shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Charl du Toit

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Trainer's themselves are perfect! However I received the wrong colours! I'll still keep them tho.
customer_reviews.author: steve fox

customer_reviews.title: Great runners
customer_reviews.text: Great running trainers, got these for a change from my normal Asics. Done a few runs in them and so far so good 👍
customer_reviews.author: Pedro cheshire

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable yet supportive
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable yet supportive. Ran my first half marathon in these bad boys and my recovery was quick with no aches and pains
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: They had received good reviews. He is very impressed with them
customer_reviews.text: They were a present for my husband. They had received good reviews. He is very impressed with them. Comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Very comfortable, light but well cushioned. I've been wearing Asics for 10 years but I am a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Fegan

customer_reviews.title: I want these shoes to be my secret.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes so much I bought three more pairs (in different colours). And a pair each for my sons. Light, stylish and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Blackcat60

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lightweight running shoe, delivery was expensive but arrived before due date
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic running shoes, fits perfectly and so comfy. Seller was fantastic as I ordered the wrong size, was rectified quickly before dispatch.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinecoast

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great looking, comfortable trainers. However I haven't yet used them for running the purpose I got them. ie running. Time will tell if they are truly great.
customer_reviews.author: gary durham

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best trainers ever bought , this is my 3rd pair
customer_reviews.author: christopher Park

customer_reviews.title: Very happy running
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing shoes. Super comfy and I nstantly knocked a minute off my 5k time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awsome shoe fits like a glove and is so lighweight
customer_reviews.author: MR NICHOLAS SUMMONS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best trainers I have bought. They make you want to run
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The comfiest running shoes I have worn - love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high quality trainers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have had a previous pair which have been the most comfortable trainers I have ever had. They have also worn exceptionally well and cleaned up easily. Despite being quite expensive the fit and protection for my feet makes them very well worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Ymore

customer_reviews.title: I have hung up my Nikes/Adidas/Innov8 & Asics
customer_reviews.text: I love ON shoes!! So should everyone. They are by far IMO the best running shoes out there. I have hung up my Nikes/Adidas/Innov8 & Asics and I doubt I will ever look back.
customer_reviews.author: Road to 70.3

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes I have ever worn. I've tried them all (brands), and these from the first run just fit and felt great. I love the elastic laces, less fuss when slipping them on and off, and they also look great. Completely sold on this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sunjayv

customer_reviews.title: Alright if you don't mind getting whatever you step in on your fingers.
customer_reviews.text: As a running shoe, these are brilliant. Lightweight upper, magically waterproof yet breathable; spongy, cushioned sole; faultless. If you also have a good amount of stones you want cleared from your drive, or acorns that need collecting, or even small pine cones that you need all in one place, these are the shoes for you. At last, a multi-purpose shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Hannah V. Eungblut

customer_reviews.title: ON CLOUD 9 with my running!
customer_reviews.text: A very good shoe, light and comfortable. So far so good, lets see how long they last!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer, better if cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe, cannot fault now has finally arrived. Major issues with delivery, apparently due to Post Office losing item. Alton Sports (Harry) cannot be faulted, great communication and service, thank you. Cannot comment on durability on shoe, but, very light and comfortable, maybe a bit pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On Clouds deliver on all levels
customer_reviews.text: It's like someone took a cast of my feet and made me a bespoke pair of running shoes. From out of the box, slipping on (yes, slipped them on) and set off on a 10-miler only to break my 5K record in the process - but that's not important. What is important is the comfort, the fit, the quality and the look and they have all of these attributes in spades. Watch out Ron Hill, I'm coming to get your 52 year running streak!
customer_reviews.author: DomW

product_meta.title: On CLOUDFLOW, Men's Running and Walking Shoes, Moss/Line - 7 UK
product_meta.description: On Running Mens Cloud X Textile Synthetic Trainers
feature_bullets: Durable engineered mesh upper with seamless synthetic overlays
Breathable and moisture-wicking textile lining for healthy in-shoe climate
Removable, dual density insole for cushioning and support
CloudTec cushioning technology active only during the foot strike
Lightweight and flexible CloudTec sole unit made from Zero-Gravity foam
